file_content.text: Just takin' a breather. Gotta figure out where we're headin' before we brave that cold.
We oughta be able to make it from here.
Thanks for stickin' your neck out for us. We'd have never made it.
Show me your gratitude some other time. I've got a cyborg to kill.
You can owe me one.
Be careful, that fella's packed with more tech than a Nar Shaddaa chop shop and has about as many screws loose.
Take care of yourself, Slam.
Glad to help.
You too, sonny.
You too, darlin'.
Keep walking. Just 'cause I helped you doesn't mean I want to hear you talk.
Good riddance.
If that's the way you want it.
You take care of Blizz for me, hear?
Don't worry, we will.
Hoowee, look at all that scrap fly!
Whoa, buddy, we're just salvagers, don't want no trouble. We ain't gettin' paid to catch blaster fire.
You in charge?
I'm not here to kill you.
You better follow orders then.
I'm looking for Slam Streever. Blizz sent me.
Where's Slam Streever?
Blizz? Your pullin' my leg... really?
I'm glad to hear the little guy's okay. Never sat right with me, what Vause done to him.
Blizz said you could help me find some equipment.
I need your help.
I'm just an old part-picker. But I reckon if Blizz sent you to me, he knew I could do you some sorta good.
How'd Blizz manage to catch the ire of that psycho?
What happened?
Tech went missing, and the foreman found a mess of it under Blizz's cot. Smelled rotten to me.
He said he was framed. You could have stood up for him.
Then why'd you let it happen?
I did! Hell, it ain't like what they found was worth all that much compared to Blizz's know-how, but there weren't no convincing them.
He's rotting in an Imperial prison, but I'll let him know you feel bad.
Okay isn't exactly the word.
Aw hell... still, it's better than what that sadist Vause had planned for him.
Hated turnin' him over, but I never really had a choice. Look, let me do right by him.
I'll do whatever I can to help. What'd Blizz send you for?
Thanks, Slam. I'll let Blizz know he's still got some friends out here.
Much appreciated.
Glad we're on the same page, don't disappoint me.
You better, or else.
I need a couple of your heat resistors and a three-phase field frequency tuner from Blizz's stash.
A couple pieces of equipment.
I need one of your heat resistors and a three-phase field frequency tuner from Blizz's stash.
A couple pieces of equipment.
Heat resistor's no problem. That phase tuner could be another story....
Foreman divvied up most of Blizz's stuff between the salvage crews, but I'll have a look.
You're in luck... everythin' you asked for's here. What's left of Blizz's stuff too. I'd appreciate it if you could get that back to him...and tell him I'm sorry, would ya?
That much I can do.
Sure.
Thanks, that means a lot to me.
Thanks.
Anything for a friend of Blizz.
I'm not carrying around a bunch of junk.
I'm not a courier.
Shoot... well, maybe if we get outta here, I can send it along to him.
It's 'bout time we pack it up. The foreman's gonna figure out we helped you, and he won't take kindly to that.
We ain't much good in a scrap and likely won't get far without someone who is.
That hot-wire job on your blaster's got bigger fish to fry. Better not waste it babysitting.
Lend a hand?
We can handle that, right?
They helped us out. It's the least we can do.
Would ya mind gettin' us out?
No problem, just watch out for the shrapnel.
Sure, I'll help.
Don't say I didn't warn you.
I'll cover the rear.
That's not really a joke; we usually make a pretty big mess.
Come on, boys, we're gettin' outta here.
Find your own way out.
We'll just make a go of it on our own, then.
Move quickly, don't bother sticking to shadows; they can see in low-light.
Huh, hadn't thought of that. Thanks, sonny.
I'm sorry, Slam. Good luck.
No worries, little lady. Y'all be careful now.
Pack it up, we gotta move.
You lookin' for the foreman? Can't say I know where he is right now.
I'll clear a path, but you better keep up.
I'm in a hurry. Let's go.
Start moving.
